name: Dungeon action platformer
description:
This is my first game inspired by dark souls. I started this project to improve my coding skills and it grew into a real game. For now it only has 1 level, 2 sword and 1 set of armor. Game is meant to be a android game but you can play it on PC too. I know that design isn't my strong side but i will keep improving I am trying my best to make it look as good as possible .

Controls:

A/D - move left or right

SPACE - jump

SHIFT - dash/dodge

F - attack

I - open inventory, click with mouse to show stats of equipment, hold and drag to equipment slot to equip a sword or armor.

E - pickup/open/enter
